name: milfoil
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant with long stems and a lot of small, delicate leaves that grows in fresh water and can cause problems because it grows in large quantities: The flooded areas are becoming colonized by invasive milfoil, which crowds out native plants. Millions of dollars have been spent fighting an aquatic war against milfoils.
More examplesFewer examplesThere have been reports of Eurasian milfoil in different parts of the river.Fears about the spread of the milfoil have prompted widening efforts to stave off invasions by it and other exotic aquatic plants.
